Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Eltrombopag olamine is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Thrombocytopenia (low platelet levels). It is used in adults and in children aged 1 year or older with chronic immune thrombocytopenia (ITP). ITP is a condition in which platelets are destroyed by the immune system. Eltrombopag olamine is used in certain patients with ITP who have not gotten better with other treatment.

Section.Para: Eltrombopag olamine is also being studied in the treatment of other conditions and types of cancer.
